mapper.update:
update order_shipping_unit
method_id = #{methodId},
method_name = #{methodName},
from_area_id = #{fromAreaId},
to_area_id = #{toAreaId},
start_weight = #{startWeight},
end_weight = #{endWeight},
fixed_fee = #{fixedFee},
weight_charge = #{weightCharge},
delivery_min_day = #{deliveryMinDay},
delivery_max_day = #{deliveryMaxDay},
discount = #{discount},
remarks = #{remarks},
create_time = #{createTime},
state = #{state},
order_id = #{orderId},
order_type = #{orderType},
`ship_unit_id` = #{shipUnitId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into order_shipping_unit
id, method_id, method_name, from_area_id, to_area_id, start_weight, end_weight, fixed_fee, weight_charge, delivery_min_day, delivery_max_day, discount, remarks, create_time, state, order_id, order_type, ship_unit_id
values ( #{id}, #{methodId}, #{methodName}, #{fromAreaId}, #{toAreaId}, #{startWeight}, #{endWeight}, #{fixedFee}, #{weightCharge}, #{deliveryMinDay}, #{deliveryMaxDay}, #{discount}, #{remarks}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{orderId}, #{orderType}, #{shipUnitId} )

insert into order_shipping_unit
id, method_id, method_name, from_area_id, to_area_id, start_weight, end_weight, fixed_fee, weight_charge, delivery_min_day, delivery_max_day, discount, remarks, create_time, state, order_id, order_type, ship_unit_id
values
#{item.id}, #{item.methodId}, #{item.methodName}, #{item.fromAreaId}, #{item.toAreaId}, #{item.startWeight}, #{item.endWeight}, #{item.fixedFee}, #{item.weightCharge}, #{item.deliveryMinDay}, #{item.deliveryMaxDay}, #{item.discount}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.state}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.orderType} #{item.shipUnitId}

sql.if:
where
1 = 1 and
id = #{t.id} and
method_id = #{t.methodId} and
method_name = #{t.methodName} and
from_area_id = #{t.fromAreaId} and
to_area_id = #{t.toAreaId} and
start_weight = #{t.startWeight} and
end_weight = #{t.endWeight} and
fixed_fee = #{t.fixedFee} and
weight_charge = #{t.weightCharge} and
delivery_min_day = #{t.deliveryMinDay} and
delivery_max_day = #{t.deliveryMaxDay} and
discount = #{t.discount} and
remarks = #{t.remarks} and
create_time = #{t.createTime} and
state = #{t.state} and
order_id = #{t.orderId} and
order_type = #{t.orderType} and

mapper.select:
SELECT osu.`id`,osu.`ship_unit_id`,osu.`method_id`,osu.`method_name`,osu.`from_area_id`,osu.`to_area_id`, osu.`start_weight`,osu.`end_weight`,osu.`fixed_fee`,osu.`weight_charge`,osu.`delivery_min_day`, osu.`delivery_max_day`,osu.`discount`,osu.`remarks`,osu.`create_time`,osu.`state`,osu.`order_id`,osu.`order_type`, o.pay_state as orderPayState FROM order_shipping_unit osu
LEFT JOIN `order` o ON osu.order_id = o.id
LEFT JOIN `wholesale_order` o ON osu.order_id = o.id
where o.id = #{orderId}

select o.id from order_shipping_unit osu
inner join `order` o
inner join wholesale_order o
on osu.order_id = o.id where o.payment_id = #{paymentId} and osu.order_type = #{orderType}
mapper.delete:
delete from order_shipping_unit where id = #{id} and ( select o.pay_state from
`order` o
`wholesale_order` o
where o.id = #{orderId} ) = 0

delete os from `order_shipping_unit` os INNER JOIN
`order_item` oi on oi.order_id = os.order_id inner join `order` o on o.id = oi.order_id
`wholesale_order_item` oi on oi.order_id = os.order_id inner join `wholesale_order` o on o.id = oi.order_id
WHERE admin_product_id = #{productId} and o.pay_state = 0

delete os from `order_shipping_unit` os INNER JOIN
`order_item` oi on oi.order_id = os.order_id inner join `order` o on o.id = oi.order_id
`wholesale_order_item` oi on oi.order_id = os.order_id inner join `wholesale_order` o on o.id = oi.order_id
WHERE oi.admin_variant_id = #{variantId} and o.pay_state = 0
delete osu.* from order_shipping_unit osu inner join `order` o on o.id = osu.order_id where osu.ship_unit_id = #{shipUnitId} and o.pay_state < 1
